summary: An email from Assistant United States Attorney Maurene Comey to an unnamed expert witness, seeking to discuss potential testimony in the upcoming trial of Ghislaine Maxwell, scheduled for July 12, 2021, in the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Maurene Comey
persons.context: Prosecutor in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, reaching out to a potential expert witness for the trial.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The accused in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, with a trial scheduled for July 12, 2021.

connections.description: Comey is a prosecutor for the U.S. government in the criminal case against Maxwell.

events.title: Scheduled Trial of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: The trial for the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell is scheduled to begin.

keyFacts: The document is a 2021 email from prosecutor Maurene Comey seeking an expert witness for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
The trial for United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled to begin on July 12, 2021.
The correspondence indicates active trial preparation by the prosecution team in the Southern District of New York.
The recipient of the email is an unnamed potential expert witness, indicating the prosecution was seeking specialized testimony.
